title: How artificial intelligence is being used in casino gaming

title: These A.I. Dreamers Don’t Fit the Stereotype
description: Young tech entrepreneurs in San Francisco are hoping to cash in, even as they wonder how artificial intelligence will affect society.

title: GFSC encouraging adoption of AI tools in finance industry

title: Surajkund swing collapse kills policeman weeks before retirement; SIT begins probe

title: Google, Amazon, Meta, Microsoft AI spending in 2026 nearly matches India’s entire national budget
description: In 2026, Google, Amazon, Meta and Microsoft are set to spend nearly $650 billion on AI, almost matching India’s entire annual budget, highlighting how fiercely big tech companies are competing to dominate artificial intelligence.
content: The year 2026 is becoming important for the global tech industry not because of a new gadget, but because of how much money companies are spending on artificial intelligence (AI). According to Bloomberg, Google, Amazon, Meta and Microsoft together ar... [2184 chars]

title: After backlash, Assam BJP removes social media post showing CM Sarma ‘shooting’ at Muslims
description: The clip combined what appeared to be original footage of Sarma handling rifles with artificial intelligence-generated images portraying Muslims as targets.
content:
The Assam unit of the Bharatiya Janata Party has deleted a video that it had posted on its X handle on Saturday that depicted Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma symbolically firing at images of two Muslim men at point-blank range.

title: New world order or bust in the age of artificial intelligence
